india_facts: India has 40 UNESCO World Heritage Sites.
The Char Dham pilgrimage includes Kedarnath, Badrinath, Dwarka, and Puri.
India has the world's highest motorable road in Ladakh.

travel_faq.best_months_general: October to March are ideal for most Indian destinations.
travel_faq.budget_travel_tip: Use state-run buses and book homestays instead of hotels.
travel_faq.peak_season_tip: Avoid long weekends and festival days in major tourist spots.
